message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and automated essay scoring. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper proposes a neural model for local coherence and integrates it with a state-of-the-art AES model. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper involves training and evaluating neural models. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society) is a less likely category, but the paper does touch upon the issue of adversarial input and its impact on the validity of AES models. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also a less likely category, but the paper does involve evaluating the effectiveness of the proposed approach on flagging adversarial input.
